title: [Question] Have regular classes started?
content:
Hey guys, just wanted to check if REGULAR classes have started or if they are still doing orientation and intro sessions. (For 1st year students)

I'm still waiting for my 2nd round results ;(

comments.body: I think bootstrap is still going on, so, no regular classes yet
Usually bootstrap goes on for the first entire week
For students joining pes through 2nd round, will they have separate bootstrap pgms n all?
no not at all! you just join and then you'll have to catch up with the syllabus( around 1 or 2 weeks worth content is what you'll miss out on ig)

Bro I am neet double dropper I will give jee mains next year acurrently currently I am enrolled in a govt college in west bengal i if I get pes next year my age will be 20 will i face any problem in placement and is there any second dropper is the in this collcollagecollage
nah nobody cares tbh by the time u come for placement u would be 24 or 25 so i dont think thats a problem
What is percentile should I target for pes rr campus cse in jan
Nah 98 is prolly too high. Considering that they're increasing intake every yr don't think that much will be needed.Did not go that high this year either.
oh i got in through kcet so i was thinking its 98, so what the percentile for jee ?
this year it cse core closed around 95 and aiml around 93.1
